metadata.name: ETH #1
metadata.description:
"The world of men will fall by his corrupted essence. We are seeing the end of paper money and the bank system, the physical money is destined to disappear, the Crypto legacy will prevail ..."

This is the #1 first NFT landscape from a futuristic universes series related to the Crypto World and the uncertain future of the humanity.

Unique version of my artwork "ETH #1" 1/1  from Crypto Civilization series.

Created by Pablo Olivera.
Music and sound design by Juan Cruz Recalde.

The collector will get the original signed 1/1 fine Art print ( Giclee 90 x 41cm) include shipping .
